abstract: Thirteen Metro-North employees are charged with cheating and helping others cheat on train conductor and engineer exams; 12 are arrested and plead not guilty; four of accused are fired and nine are suspended.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said the defendants stole copies of tests and their answers, then distributed them to other candidates who had yet to take the exams.

headline.main: 13 Metro-North Workers Accused of Cheating on Conductor Exams
headline.print_headline: 13 Metro-North Workers Accused of Cheating on Conductor Exams

snippet: Prosecutors said the defendants stole copies of tests and their answers, then distributed them to other candidates who had yet to take the exams.
